creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: canal with boats lining each side; houses along R side and in background; figures working on and around boats; three ducks swimming at center
marks:

title: Urayasu
